Text:
Simply because more information/content is always better, i'm glad this is available and i tip my virtual hat to TvTeam as always.... But by every other measure, this is truly shite. Larry is an absolute moron (and not the good kind), and his long-stale laughless shtick isn't getting any better with age. 

If you're not a fan and are just looking to try something new.... Try something else.
